text: "Gud morning everyone. Still feel bad, sipping on hot theraflu so i can get under my covers & sweat this flu outta me. Body aches"

label: White
text: "Sinus infection, flu, staph, now stomach virus. Seriously why do I have a immune system if it shuts down?!"

text: You have to be kidding me! The second time with the flu in 2 weeks!!! #sick

label: White
text: My guess would be colonization. England had a far longer social influence in other places than it did in America.
